text:
-smi#n dadhAqtyagnEq yattEq paraq(gm)q hRunnAmEtyA#haiqtadvA aqgnEH priqyaM dhAma# priqyamEqvAsyaq dhAmOpA$&&*pnOtiq tAvEhiq sa(gm) ra#BAvahAq ityA#haq vyE#vainE#naq pari# dhattEq pA~jca#janyEqShvapyE$ddhyagnaq ityA#haiqSha vA aqgniH pA~jca#janyOq yaH pa~jca#citIkaq-stasmA#dEqvamA#hartaqvyA# upa# ( ) dadhAtyEqtadvA Ru#tUqnAM priqyaM dhAmaq yadRu#taqvyA# RutUqnAmEqva priqyaM dhAmAva# rundhE suqmEkaq ityA#ha saM~MvathsaqrO vai suqmEka#H saM~Mvathsaqrasyaiqva priqyaM dhAmOpA$&&*pnOti || 46
(aBa#vaq - nnAyu#rEqqva - rtaqvyA# upaq - ShaDvi(gm)#SatiSca) (A11)
